interface.name: Timeable
interface.javadoc:
This interface is used by the Timer class. A class that uses Timer objects must implement this interface.
Timer
Patrick Chan

This method is executed every time a timer owned by this object ticks. An object can own more than one timer but all timers call this method when they tick; you can use the supplied timer parameter to determine which timer has ticked.
timer a handle to the timer that has just ticked.
